bwwExcerpt: This show rises or falls on its Fanny. Feldstein is game and likable but monochromatic in her acting and singing. Consequently, her star turn never quite lifts off the stage. Between the performance and the presentation, even "His Love Makes Me Beautiful," a cheeky Follies number in which Fanny pulls a fast one while playing a bride, leaves you jilted.
